name: dryingLevel_setValue
description: This function is used to set the drying level of a dryer.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to set the drying level.

parameters.name: predefinedCompartment
parameters.description: The predefined compartment to set the drying level.

parameters.name: dryingLevel
parameters.description: The value to set as the drying level.
